title: Dinendal, Mirkwood Archer (15R12)
text:

Game Text:	Aid - (3). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (3) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, except an [Elven]companion, exert bearer. Bearer is an archer.
